mapper.sql: cp.ID, cp.PROJECT_ID, cp.JOIN_TIME, cp.SUPPLIER_ID, cp.RANKING, cp.TOTAL_PRICE, cp.TOTAL_SCORE, cp.PACKAGE_ID, cp.IS_WON_BID, cp.IS_SEND_NOTICE, cp.CREATED_AT, cp.UPDATED_AT,cp.IS_CREATE_CONTRACT,cp.PRICE_RATIO,cp.WON_PRICE,cp.CONTRACT_ID,cp.IS_DELETED,cp.CONFIRM_TIME
mapper.select:
select
from T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS cp where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS (ID, PROJECT_ID, JOIN_TIME, SUPPLIER_ID, RANKING, TOTAL_PRICE, TOTAL_SCORE, PACKAGE_ID, IS_WON_BID, IS_SEND_NOTICE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isWonBid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isSendNotice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS
ID,
PROJECT_ID,
JOIN_TIME,
SUPPLIER_ID,
RANKING,
TOTAL_PRICE,
TOTAL_SCORE,
PACKAGE_ID,
IS_WON_BID,
IS_SEND_NOTICE,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,
PRICE_RATIO,
WON_PRICE,
IS_DELETED,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{totalScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isWonBid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isSendNotice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{wonPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS
JOIN_TIME = #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RANKING = #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_SCORE = #{totalScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_WON_BID = #{isWonBid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_SEND_NOTICE = #{isSendNotice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONFIRM_TIME = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_CREATE_CONTRACT = #{isCreateContract},
CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId},
PRICE_RATIO = #{priceRatio},
WON_PRICE = #{wonPrice},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where 1=1
and SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS set PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOIN_TIME = #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANKING = #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_SCORE = #{totalScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_WON_BID = #{isWonBid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_SEND_NOTICE = #{isSendNotice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT PP."ID",PP."NAME" FROM T_BSS_PPMS_PACKAGE pp WHERE PP.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId}

SELECT PP."NAME",pp."ID" as PPID,
FROM T_BSS_PPMS_PACKAGE pp INNER JOIN T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS cp ON PP."ID" = CP.PACKAGE_ID WHERE PP.PROJECT_ID =#{projectId} ORDER BY CP.TOTAL_SCORE DESC

SELECT wm_concat(CC."NAME") PACKAGE_ID, CC.SUPPLIER_ID FROM( SELECT pp.name ,CP.PACKAGE_ID,CP.SUPPLIER_ID ,CP.PROJECT_ID,CP.IS_WON_BID,CP.IS_SEND_NOTICE FROM T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS cp LEFT JOIN T_BSS_PPMS_PACKAGE pp ON CP.PACKAGE_ID = PP."ID" ) CC WHERE 1=1 AND CC.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND CC.IS_WON_BID =#{isWonBid} AND CC.IS_SEND_NOTICE= #{isSendNotice}
GROUP BY CC.SUPPLIER_ID

SELECT
FROM T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS cp WHERE cp.PACKAGE_ID =#{packageId} and cp.IS_WON_BID =1

SELECT
FROM T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS cp WHERE cp.PACKAGE_ID =#{packageId}
SELECT PACKAGE_ID FROM T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS WHERE IS_WON_BID=1 AND PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} GROUP BY PACKAGE_ID

SELECT
FROM T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS cp WHERE cp.CONTRACT_ID=#{contractId} and cp.IS_DELETED=0 and cp.IS_WON_BID =1

SELECT
FROM T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS cp WHERE cp.IS_WON_BID=1 AND cp.IS_DELETED=0 and cp.PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId}

SELECT
FROM T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS cp WHERE 1=1 AND CP.PACKAGE_ID =#{packageId} and cp.IS_WON_BID=1 ORDER BY RANKING
